'''Cuihua Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Cuihua Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Cuihua Trees are found all over [[Teyvat]] and are recognizable by the various fruits they can bear: [[Apple]]s, [[Sunsettia]]s and [[Lavender Melon]]s. They are more commonly found in some areas, such as [[Starfell Valley]] and [[Bishui Plain]].

For specific locations, see the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?bbs_presentation_style=no_header&lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=179&center=583.00,-298.00&zoom=-2.00 Official Interactive Map].
